channel.title: Open Source on Navendu Pottekkat
channel.description: Recent content in Open Source on Navendu Pottekkat

item.title: Contributing to Documentation in Open-Source
item.description: Contributing to documentation is really impactful for an open-source project. It can also be a stepping stone to make code contributions. Learn how.

item.title: Everything you Need to Know About Google Summer of Code (GSoC): Important Dates, Eligibility, Application, Getting Selected and Other Tips
item.description: Google Summer of Code (GSoC) is a great way to start contributing to open source while getting paid to do so. This article dives deep into everything GSoC from the application procedure to tips from real experience on being successful

item.title: Pull Requests Like a PRO
item.description: Tips to make High-Quality Pull Requests.

item.title: How to Make Non-Code Contributions to Open-Source Projects
item.description: Open-Source is not just about code. See how you can make non-code contributions to open-source.

item.title: 20+ Open Source Internship Programs that you can Apply to
item.description: A curated list of Open Source Internship Programs with all the necessary details.
